name: Notification Bar, Sticky Notification Bar, Sticky Welcome Bar for any theme
author: Ginger Plugins

sections.description:
Want to display a notification about a promotion or a news? GP Notification Bar plugin lets you do that easily.

Features

  • Display a message with or without button.
  • Button will open a URL in same tab or in new window.
  • Position the bar on top.
  • Can be fixed at position (Sticky Bar).
  • Display on Scroll option.
  • Display a close button for the visitor.
  • Set the number of seconds before auto close.
  • Colors are fully customizable.
  • Set End date.
sections.installation:
1. Click Plugins/Add New from the WordPress admin panel
  2. Search for “GP Notification Bar” and install

-or-

  1. Download the .zip package
  2. Unzip into the subdirectory ‘gp-notification-bar’ within your local WordPress plugins directory
  3. Refresh plugin page and activate plugin
sections.faq:
GP Notification Bar and GDPR compliance?

This plugin doesn’t collect any personal information.

I don’t want the plugin to be displayed on “wp-admin”, what should I do?

Notification bar doesn’t display on the wp-admin pages, except on settings page.
On the settings page it acts as a preview so that you can see the changes you make.

Is Notification Bar is compatible with all theme and page builder?

Yes absolutely. We have built the widget in such a way that it can easily work with all the page builders such as Elementor, Divi, Visual Composer, WPBakery, Beaver, SiteOrigin and many more.
